description:
Classic Birks: comfortable, supportive and ready to go anywhere. Whether you pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier, they deliver the same flexible shock-absorbing base. Arch support and a deep heel cup cradle every step, because feeling good at sunset dance parties never goes out of style.

  • Smooth and durable oiled nubuck leather uppers
  • Slip-on style with straps that open if you want
  • Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management
  • Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet
  • Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing
  • Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural stride
  • EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks
name: Birkenstock Arizona Leather Soft Footbed Sandals - Unisex
